_meanings:
{@--1@} To be pleased, be
gracious or propitious (<ab>oft.</ab> with
<ab>inf.</ab>); {#tamAlapatrAstaraRAsu raMtuM prasIda#} 
{#SaSvanmalayasTalIzu#} <ls>R. 6. 64.</ls>

{@--2@} To beg pardon, pray for
grace.

{@--3@} To purify, make clear or
pure; {#cetaH prasAdayati#} <ls>Bh. 2. 23.</ls>
